meta.title: Auto Extraction Data Agent
meta.description: The Auto Extraction Data Agent is designed to automatically extract and update key transactional details from conversations between clients wanting to purchase products and customer service representatives.

conversationStarters: Can you help me purchase a product?
I need to update my transaction details.
What are the details of my recent purchase?
Can you provide the transactional details for my order?
knowledge: Product Name: string. Example: "Keogen Hair Spray"
Country: string in Country Code. Example: "VN"
Address: Address of the customer so that the Customer Service can use to send the product to. Example: 24 North Street Ho Chi Minh City
Product Price: the Price of each item in Float Number without the Currency. Example: 6.7
IsGift: True or False. Is this product a gift or not? Example: True
Quantities: in integer. How many items the client want to buy. Example: 2
